document_data.caption: A map showing Wall Street and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Wall Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Wall Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Wall Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road ran parallel to the eastern outer city wall in the Southern Ward, originating in the north in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on [[River Street]], and passing south to eventually end on [[Coach Street]]. Along the way Wall Street connected with [[Belzer's Walk]], [[Olaim's Cut]], [[Ruid's Stroll]], the [[Specterwalk]], [[Tilman's Lane]], and the [[Wagonrace]].
document_data.Notable Locations: [[The Redbridle Stables]] was located along Wall Street.
